definition_cn: 极好的；了不起的；不现实的
definition_en: extremely good; excellent; imaginary; not real
example_sentence: We watched a fantastic play yesterday.

definition_cn: 美丽动人的；绚丽的；极好的
example_sentence: She looked gorgeous in her wedding dress.

definition_cn: 巧妙的；聪颖的；很成功的
definition_en: very clever or impressive; very successful
example_sentence: He came up with a brilliant idea to solve the problem.

definition_en: unusual and surprising; remarkable; very strange
example_sentence: His extraordinary talent in music amazed everyone.
